content: > this one-size classic wee cardigan > features clean styling and smart > construction to create a sweet raglan > design that showcases your special > statement yarn george is worked > seamlessly from the top down with a > crew neckline shaped using clever > short row a double-rib edging frames > the cardigan beautifully quick to > knit and thoroughly engaging george > is a design you ll return to again and > again as a go-to baby gift knit **construction ** george is constructed seamlessly from the top down using a raglan yoke construction the neckline is shaped with short row to create a higher back neck after knitting the yoke the garment is divided to knit the sleeves and body sleeves are knit in the round **sizing ** to fit actual chest measurement of 15 /38cms newborn to 3 months this garment is designed to fit with 2½ inches/6 5 cms of positive wearing ease the ease of the garment is incorporated into the sizing already **skill level ** intermediate **techniques used ** knit and purl increasing and decreasing picking up stitches working small circumferences in the round short row shaping **yarn requirements ** * tarndie origins 8ply 100% australian polwarth 197yd 180m /100g - 1 skein **or** dk/8ply weight yarn in two colours **main colour ** 180yd/165m **contrast colour ** 50yd/45m original yarn is a worsted spun 4ply low micron polwarth yardage is approximate and may vary depending on your knitting style and yarn selection sample shown in botanical print hand-dyed by bee mannering discontinued and tarndie bluestone
